titleStmt.title: The French king's dream, which he had in his coach going to Marly : together with its explication / by the Sieur Van Beuninghen, late ambassadour from the States General here in England. ; Licens'd November 22. 1689. J.F.
titleStmt.author: Beuningen, Koenraad van, 1622-1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R.B. and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin, in the Old Baily,

notesStmt.note: English and French in double columns.
Imperfect: pages are stained, with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
